# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes an allocated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NetServiceBrowser] object.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Return Value

Initialized [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NetServiceBrowser] object.
